text: 3.10: 1 Zo 2.29; 4.8The Fhe Bakɨmen kam, the Satanan kam? Nza maaŋ muuŋgip kaŋgi saŋv, nza khaŋ muuŋgip, gangip, kaŋgirga. Guma tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui fhu, ana Fhe Bakɨmen kam fhuvara. Guma wo phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, ana guigira won ndavar mbe ndɨɨv, tɨvir vhuuin mbe mbui fhu, ana vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen kam fhuvara.
